case.title: White Ken seeking black Barbie - 32
case.text:
I am a 32 year old white British guy, well educated with a great career in the City. I'm thoughtful and generous, have a quick wit and love to make people laugh, even if I can be a little shy at first!
I would like to meet a young black lady who takes a great deal of pride in her appearance, has excellent taste in clothes and shoes, and is never happier then when she is shopping. She should also be bright, funny and well spoken and not afraid to laugh at herself from time to time!
If you think this might be you then please reply with a picture and tell me a bit about yourself.
